greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n, d < n/d} (d XOR n/d), where XOR is bitwise-xor (A003987).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A318460(n) = { my(xors=0); fordiv(n,d, if(d<(n/d), xors += bitxor(d,n/d))); (xors); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 28 2018
